reviews.review: amazing game
Really great game and story. I enjoyed the whole single play game, with lots of good puzzles.  I love the characters and their dialogues, very funny and full of sarcasm.
A Classic..

Ein Klassiker. Lustiges Knobelspiel das nie zu schwer wird und mit schwarzem Humor durchzogen ist. Die Einzelspielerkampagne macht genau so viel Spaß wie die Koopkampagne mit einem Freund. Keine HighEnd-Maschine zum zocken mit guten Einstellungen benötigt. 
Der Wiederspielwert ist relativ hoch, allerdings sollte man ein paar Jahre Pause machen um die Rätsel wenigstens etwas wieder zu vergessen.

The atmosphere Portal 2 creates is incredible. You have this futuristic underground lab that's falling apart. This big giant supercomputer that controls the entire facility. It's just so darn cool.

The gameplay is extremely pleasing. You'll have to solve interesting puzzles in creative ways. It's very fun.

The story also plays a big role in Portal 2. It is very interesting to learn about the story of Aperture Laboratories and the way things have evolved.  GLaDOS and Wheatney are just two robots but you'll be astonished to see how well put and interesting of characters they are.

Шедевр. 10/10

This game is a masterpiece undeniably. It is less intense than the first, but makes up in the complexity of its puzzles (and with the online content). Completing puzzles with portals, gravity, acceleration goo, bouncy goo, portal goo, energy barriers, springs, turrets, lasers, laser boxes, regular boxes, edgeless boxes, doors, elevators, energy vortexes, and more, will make you feel like you have IQ 1 million after the puzzles increase in complexity.

The story is unfathomably fantastic for a game built on mechanics first. There are only three real characters, one is mute (you), but that doesn't stop Portal 2 from delivering some of the best wit and dialogue I have ever experienced in a game. You will fall in and out of friendship with Wheatley, and you will discover GLaDOS is really the sweetest bean ever.

The co op is single player but harder. Level 9 of the extra levels was rage inducing in a good way.  Make sure you don't use discord or teamspeak, because for whatever reason for some players it is mandatory to use the in game mic with friends.

Regardless
Story: 9/10
Mechanics: 10/10
Co-Op: 8/10

TOTAL SCORE: 10/10
Glados sexy
A classic. I recommend this game to everyone.

One of my favorite games ever, Portal 2 is a major recommendation from me. The puzzles are challenging but not impossibly hard, the physics work well, a playthrough lasts a little while but can be completed within one session, and the co-op mode is extremely fun (especially when you're killing your friend with a laser). Valve, where is Portal 3?
